definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[עלם]] (√ of foll., meaning dub.; cf. NH [[עוֹלָם]] (chiefly world, age); MI:7, MI:10 [[עלם]], Ph. id., Aram. [[עָֽלְמָא]], 9olmo0, Nab. [[עלם]], Palm. [[עלמא]]; Ar. 9alamun creation, world, etc.; Eth. 94lam: aevum, saeculum, etc.; acc. to Thes al. from I. [[עלם]] the hidden, cf. Kö:ii. 1:87; Lag:BN 115 cp. quadril. 90’lm primitive waters; Ew:§ 77 a cp. Eth. 9lat: time [√ Di:923]; Ba:ZMG xliv (1890), 685 cp. As. ullûti, ullâ [ullânu, remote time], cf. Dl:HWB 65 Jen:ZA vii).
